front.title: Definitions of Tests for ATM Management

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base(MIB) for use with network management protocols in theInternet community. In particular, it describes objects usedfor managing ATM-based interfaces, devices, networks andservices in addition to those defined in the ATM MIB[RFC2515], to provide support for the management of on-demandATM Loopback Tests.
